data.name: Seblen: Battle!
data.detailed_description:
Seblen: Battle! is the first official game release set in the world of The Seblen Chronicles. A rich, classical fantasy experience that now comes to you in a Battle Card Game!

Quick and easy to learn but difficult to master, this battle card game is for single players and has an online 1v1 Versus mode. The launch is releasing with:

40 Seblen Character Cards
10 Specialty Skill Cards
6 Rarity Tiers

Character cards are direct from the fantasy series, The Seblen Chronicles and its companion releases.

Enter the world of Seblen today and Battle with the forces of good and evil alike!

data.short_description: Seblen: Battle is a quick and easy to learn, but difficult to master card game for single players and online 1v1 Versus mode. The launch is releasing with: 40 Seblen Character Cards 10 Specialty Skill Cards 6 Rarity Tiers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
